Watch TV
I go into the living room. I find the remote. I turn on the tv. I sit on the couch and watch tv.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <remote_control> (1.1000)
[FIND] <remote_control> (1.1000)
[FIND] <television> (1.410)
[TURNTO] <television> (1.410)
[POINTAT] <television> (1.410)
[SWITCHON] <television> (1.410)
[FIND] <couch> (1.352)
[SIT] <couch> (1.352)
[TURNTO] <television> (1.410)
[WATCH] <television> (1.410)
